title: Exploring Mobile Development: Flutter & Strategy
excerpt: Starting my journey into mobile app development with Flutter, contrasting it with mobile website interfaces, and strategizing commercial applications.
author: Codem
content:
New Horizons: Mobile Development

Starting to look at mobile development alongside website development. Development on mobile apps can look extremely different compared to the mobile interface of a website. This is very important to take into account when designing applications rather than websites.

Diving into Flutter

I now am attempting to get started with something like Flutter in order to produce development for mobiles as well rather than just mobile interface. I might be attempting to make one further down the line commercially rather than on a personal project basis as its an important piece of the package that comes along with software development.

Strategy and Evaluation

Ill start of with weighing the pros and cons between manually coding or template wise development via other tools. This foundational choice will guide my early learning.

You can check out my portfolio to see my website development work so far.
